subject: Slash: /tasks run warns paused but still runs
description:
Repro (tmux, repo root):
1) /tasks add -p high "Fix tests" (or any task)
2) /tasks pause
3) /tasks run

Actual: output shows "Task queue is paused. Use /tasks resume to enable auto-run." and immediately "Running task: Fix tests" (task executes, tool calls start).
Expected: Either (a) do not run while paused and only show paused warning, or (b) clarify that manual /tasks run will execute even when auto-run is paused (message should reflect this).

Notes: Observed in tmux segment F; tasks run despite pause.
